page.title: 09CHILDREN IN LANGOLD
page.content: In{Langold}children can belong to the{ {Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides.}They also have a{school football team}and { {netball}and{Smokeys team.}There is a {Youth club. }They have a {park.}Most of the{boys}like{bikes.}The{boys}in their spare time like going for {walks,playing football,reading,looking {after pets,watching telly,}going{bird watching,doing the{gardening,}going {swimming}in{Langold Lake,}going to the {disco,}going{shopping,}going to the {woods}and{fishing, drawing, music, {cricket clubs}and using{home computers The{girls}in their spare time like {music, swimming in the lake, netball, watching{telly,french skipping, {marbles,}walking in the {woods, {reading,riding bikes,shopping {and looking after pets. } {
